item.title: Exa Search
item.description: Yet another fascinating AI product: exa.ai. It crawls the Web, but you can get a list of results via a ChatGPT-prompt. It does extremely well for when you're at a "loss of words" for what to Google for. Very stoked Exa is building this. Desperately needed.
